---
title: "Country Analysis"
---

This page tracks changes in life expectancy, GDP per capita, and population over time for a single country.

```{python}
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

df = pd.read_csv("gapminder.csv")

country_name = "United States"
c = df[df["country"] == country_name].sort_values("year")

plt.figure()
plt.plot(c["year"], c["life_expectancy"])
plt.xlabel("Year")
plt.ylabel("Life Expectancy")
plt.title(f"Life Expectancy Over Time: {country_name}")
plt.show()

plt.figure()
plt.plot(c["year"], c["gdp_per_capita"])
plt.xlabel("Year")
plt.ylabel("GDP per Capita")
plt.title(f"GDP per Capita Over Time: {country_name}")
plt.show()

plt.figure()
plt.plot(c["year"], c["population_millions"])
plt.xlabel("Year")
plt.ylabel("Population (millions)")
plt.title(f"Population Over Time: {country_name}")
plt.show()
